CONTENT: ぜんぶ天気のせいでいいよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We can blame it all on the weather

CONTENT: この気まずさも倦怠感も
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: All this awkwardness and exhaustion

CONTENT: 太陽は隠れながら知らんぷり
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The sun hides away, pretending not to see

CONTENT: ガタゴト揺れる満員電車
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: A packed train clatters along the track

CONTENT: すれ違うのは準急列車
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It brushes past a local express

CONTENT: 輪郭のない雲の 表情を探してみる
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm gonna search for feelings in a shapeless cloud

CONTENT: 「作者の気持ちを答えなさい」
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The test asks, \"How was the author feeling here?\"

CONTENT: いったいなにが 正解なんだい?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What could the right answer possibly be?

CONTENT: 予定調和の シナリオ踏み抜いて
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Breaking through the script of pre-established harmony

CONTENT: 青い春なんてもんは
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Everyone talks about the \"springtime of life\"

CONTENT: 僕には似合わないんだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And I'm just not cut out for that

CONTENT: それでも知ってるから 一度しかない瞬間は
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yet I know that this moment, which will never come again,

CONTENT: 儚さを孕んでる
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: is rich with evanescence

CONTENT: 絶対忘れてやらないよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I will never forget, ever

CONTENT: いつか死ぬまで何回だって
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So many times before I die someday...

CONTENT: こんなこともあったって 笑ってやんのさ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'll laugh thinking about what it was like

CONTENT: 風においてかれそうで
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I feel like the wind's leaving me behind

CONTENT: 必死に喰らいついてる
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So I'm desperately clinging on

CONTENT: いつもの鐘の音も 窓際に積んだ埃も
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That familiar sound of the bell That dust piled up on the window sill

CONTENT: 教室の匂いだって
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Even the smell of the classroom

CONTENT: 絶対忘れてやらないよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I will never forget, ever

CONTENT: いつか死ぬまで何回だって
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So many times before I die someday...

CONTENT: こんなこともあったって 笑ってやんのさ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'll laugh thinking about what it was like

CONTENT: ありがとうございました!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Thank you!

CONTENT: 1曲目\"忘れてやらない\"でした
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That was our first song, \"I Will Never Forget!\"

CONTENT: 意外と盛り上がった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I can't believe how enthusiastic they are.

CONTENT: 喜多ちゃーん!　けど...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Kita-chan! But...

CONTENT: それじゃあ 次の曲の前に
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Now, before we play our next song...

CONTENT: 結束バンドのリーダー ドラムの伊地知虹夏先輩です
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: los dejo con la líder de Kessoku Band, Nijika Ijichi, la baterista.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Let's have a few words from Kessoku Band's leader: our drummer and my senpai, Nijika Ijichi!

CONTENT: 皆さん はじめまして!　盛り上がってますかー?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Nice to meet you, everyone! Are you having a good time?!

CONTENT: 割と頑張ってんな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: They've worked pretty hard.

CONTENT: ですねー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yeah...

CONTENT: でも ぼっちちゃん...　ベースの山田リョウいわく ん?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pero Bocchi... Según Ryo Yamada, nuestra bajista,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But Bocchi-chan... Our esteemed bassist, Ryo Yamada,

CONTENT: 結束バンドは MCが つまらないそうでして
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: told me that any MCing I did for Kessoku Band would be a flop,

CONTENT: \"どの口が?\"って思うんですけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: and at first I thought, \"How dare you!\"

CONTENT: 面白いトークできるようになるまで　ライブ告知だけにしときますねー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Me limitaré a promocionarnos hasta que tengamos más gracia.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But until I learn to be entertaining with this stuff, I figured I'd stick to concert announcements!

CONTENT: って... まだ 次のライブの予定はないんですけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Aunque aún no tenemos más conciertos programados.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Of course, I don't actually know when our next concert'll be...

CONTENT: もし 気になるって人がいたら　ボーカルの喜多ちゃんか...　喜多ちゃーん!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Si le interesamos a alguien, que hable con Kita... ¡Kita!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But if you wanna see more, just hit up our vocalist, Kita-chan,

CONTENT: ギターの ぼっ... あっ 後藤ひとりちゃんに　今度 声かけてください!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: O con Bo... Hitori Goto, nuestras guitarristas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: or our guitarist, Boー Hitori Gotoh, when you can!

CONTENT: ひとりちゃーん!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hitori-chan!

CONTENT: それじゃ 次の曲 いこっか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Anyway, let's move on to the next song!

CONTENT: はい!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Right!

CONTENT: それでは聴いてください　2曲目で\"星座になれたら\"
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Nuestra segunda canción es \"Ojalá fuéramos una constelación\".
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Please lend us your ears! Our next song is \"To Become a Constellation...\"!

CONTENT: もうすぐ時計は6時
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The time's almost six

CONTENT: もうそこに一番星
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The evening star's already out there

CONTENT: 影を踏んで
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Walking home, stepping on shadows

CONTENT: 夜に紛れたくなる帰り道
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm hoping to blend into the night

CONTENT: やっぱり おかしい　昨日まで なんともなかったのに　1・2弦のチューニングが 異常に合わない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Algo pasa. Ayer estaba totalmente afinada, pero hoy la primera cuerda no suena bien.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yeah, something's not right. Lucky you, lucky you It's been fine this whole time, Must be nice to have everyone love you but now I can't get the E string in tune...

CONTENT: 「いいや 僕は ずっと一人きりさ」
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: \"No, I've always been alone.\"

CONTENT: 君と集まって 星座になれたら
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If only I could become a constellation with you...

CONTENT: 星降る夜...　1弦が!　マズい! せめて 2弦のチューニングだけでも...　あっ ペグが故障してる!　あれじゃ 2弦も使いものにならない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¡La cuerda se...! Oh, no. Tengo que afinar al menos la segunda. ¿La clavija no funciona? Así tampoco podrá usar la segunda.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: On a night of falling stars, I make that moment's wish The E string! Not good... But if I can at least get the B string in tune... A sparkling, twinkling, trembling signal up high The peg's broken! She can't use the B string now.

CONTENT: これじゃ ソロ 無理だぞ　どうしよう... もうすぐソロが来る　せっかくの文化祭ライブが　私の機材トラブルで台なしに　どうしよう どうしよう...　どうしよう どうしよう どうしよう!　僕がどんなに 眩しくても
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No puede hacer un solo. ¿Qué hago? Ya casi llegamos a mi solo. Voy a estropear el concierto por problemas técnicos. ¿Qué hago? ¿Qué hago?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She won't be able to do her solo. If only I could become a constellation with you... What'll I do? My solo's coming up... The kind that people point to in the sky If our big culture festival performance fails because I had equipment trouble... Don't let these lines that link us come undone What do I do? What do I do, what do I do, what do I do, what do I do?! No matter how brightly I shine

CONTENT: 喜多さん... 打ち合わせしてないのにアドリブ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Kita-san... She's ad-libbing completely on the fly!

CONTENT: みんなに見せてよ　本当は後藤さんは すごく かっこいいんだってところを
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Enséñales lo genial que eres en realidad, Goto.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm going to make sure everyone can see... how amazingly cool Gotoh-san really is!

CONTENT: あのギター 何やってんだ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What's their guitarist doing?

CONTENT: よく分かんねえけど スゲえ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Dunno, but it's pretty awesome!

CONTENT: この土壇場でボトルネック奏法とか 普通やるか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿A quién se le ocurre tocar con slide?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Who whips out the bottleneck playing at a time like this?

CONTENT: あれならチューニング ズレてても関係ないもんね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Así da igual que no esté afinada.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Now it won't matter if she's a little out of tune!

CONTENT: 遥か彼方 僕らは出会ってしまった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We met each other, so far away

CONTENT: カルマだから 何度も出会ってしまうよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And because it's our karma, we'll meet again and again

CONTENT: 雲の隙間で
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: In the gaps between the clouds

CONTENT: 君と集まって 星座になれたら
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If only I could become a constellation with you...

CONTENT: 夜広げて 描こう絵空事
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: As night falls, I dream that unlikely dream

CONTENT: 暗闇を照らすような 満月じゃなくても
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Not quite a full moon But still lighting up the dark

CONTENT: だから集まって 星座になりたい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I want to become a constellation with you

CONTENT: 色とりどりの光 放つような
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The kind that puts out many-colored light

CONTENT: つないだ線 解かないよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I won't let these lines that link us come undone

CONTENT: 君がどんなに 眩しくても
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No matter how brightly you shine

CONTENT: ああー えっと...　ホントは続けて 最後の曲 いくところなんですけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: En realidad pensábamos pasar a la siguiente canción enseguida,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Well... I wasn't going to say anything before our last song,

CONTENT: これだけ言わせてください!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: but please let me say one thing!

CONTENT: 今日は本当に ありがとー!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Thanks so much for having us today!

CONTENT: この日のライブを みんなが将来　自慢できるくらいのバンドに なりまーす!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Haremos que puedan jactarse de haber venido a vernos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We're gonna try our best to become so good, that one day you'll brag about having seen us here!

CONTENT: いいぞー!　武道館 行っちゃえー!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Awesome! Budokan-bound!

CONTENT: ご... なんとかさんも よかったぞ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You were great, Whatever-san!

CONTENT: 弦 切れたのに頑張ったね!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¡Y eso que se te rompió una cuerda!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You did good even when your string broke!

CONTENT: ほら 後藤さん ひと言くらい何か言わなきゃ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hey, Gotoh-san! Looks like you've gotta say something!

CONTENT: コ... コミュ症は　事前に台本作っとかないと しゃべれないのに
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Los que tenemos ansiedad social necesitamos un guion para hablar.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: P-People with social anxiety can't talk without a pre-arranged script!

CONTENT: 予想外のフリされたら...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Si me obligan a improvisar así...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If you put me in this unplanned situation...

CONTENT: 何か面白いこと 何か面白いこと 何か...　何か... 面白いこと...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Piensa en algo divertido. Algo divertido...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Say something funny. Something funny. Something... Something... funny...

CONTENT: 後藤さん?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Gotoh-san?

CONTENT: きゃー! 後藤さん!　ぼっちちゃん 大丈夫?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Gotoh-san?! You okay, Bocchi-chan?!

CONTENT: お前は伝説のロックスターだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Eres una estrella del rock legendaria.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You're a legendary rock star!

CONTENT: ハハハッ あー ぼっちちゃん 最高!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Bocchi-chan rocks!

CONTENT: 少しは心配しろ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: At least show a little concern!

CONTENT: ホントだよ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Seriously!

CONTENT: 担架 持ってこい!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Someone bring a stretcher!

CONTENT: ひとり! 大丈夫か?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hitori! You okay?!

CONTENT: うちのお姉ちゃんが すみません
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm sorry about my sister.

CONTENT: ああー いえいえ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: H-Hey, it's fine!

CONTENT: 終わった...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's all over.

CONTENT: 後藤さん 大丈夫? 目 覚めた?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Are you all right, Gotoh-san? Are you conscious?

CONTENT: あ... はい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Y-Yeah...

CONTENT: よかったー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Thank goodness.

CONTENT: ケガも大したことないみたい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Looks like it wasn't too bad.

CONTENT: あの...　ん?　台なしにしちゃって 本当に すみませんでした　せっかくの...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Um... I'm really sorry I ruined everything. After all you did...

CONTENT: ううん なぜか 逆に盛り上がってたかも
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Para nada. Yo diría que les encantó.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Actually, I think people liked it even more.

CONTENT: あっ 虹夏ちゃんたちは?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Um... Where are the others?

CONTENT: 今 片づけ中
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: They're cleaning up now.

CONTENT: 後藤さん大丈夫なら このあと打ち上げ行こうって
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Si estás bien, podemos ir a celebrarlo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: They said we'd have an after-party if you were feeling well enough.

CONTENT: でも 無理そうなら また今度に
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: O lo dejamos para otro día.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But if you aren't, we can save it for later.

CONTENT: あっ はい...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: R-Right...

CONTENT: あっ 驚きました
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, that was a surprise.

CONTENT: 喜多さん いつの間にか上手になってて
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Kita-san. You got so good so fast.

CONTENT: バッキングだけだけどね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Only for rhythm, of course.

CONTENT: えっと...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Um...

CONTENT: 私は　人を惹きつけられるような演奏は できない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Yo no puedo cautivar a la gente tocando.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I can't do the kind of playing that really draws people in.

CONTENT: けど みんなと 合わせるのは得意みたいだから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pero parece que se me da bien tocar en grupo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But I seem to be pretty good at the give-and-take with you guys.

CONTENT: これからも もっと ギター頑張るから 教えてね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Me esforzaré, así que sigue enseñándome,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm gonna keep working on my playing, so please keep teaching me.

CONTENT: 後藤さ...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Gotoh-saー

CONTENT: ひとりちゃん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hitori-chan.

CONTENT: あっ え... あっ はい!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: R-Right!

CONTENT: じゃあ 先 行くね 準備できたら来てね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ya me voy. Ven cuando estés lista.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Okay, I'm off! Come by when you're ready!

CONTENT: あ... はい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: R-Right...

CONTENT: 私 ひとりちゃんを 支えていけるようになるね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Voy a conseguir ser un buen apoyo para ti, Hitori.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm going to become good enough to support Hitori-chan.

CONTENT: これにて...　打ち上げ 打ち上げ ぼっちちゃん 大丈夫かな　文化祭を終了します
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Y aquí termina... -¡Fiesta! ¡Fiesta! -¿Estará bien Bocchi? -...el festival de Shuka.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: After-party! After-party! I hope Bocchi-chan's okay...

CONTENT: あっ ダイブの人
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: La que se tiró al público.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hey, it's the stage diver.

CONTENT: ああ ロックなヤベえヤツか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, the crazy rocker chick?

CONTENT: いつか...　いつか 高校やめてやる!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Some day... Some day, I will quit high school!

CONTENT: お父さん ごめんなさい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Forgive me, Father!

CONTENT: お姉ちゃん何してるの? ワン ワン!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What're you doing, Sis?

CONTENT: お父さんから借りたギター　ライブで壊してしまいました
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: En el concierto rompí la guitarra que me prestaste.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I broke the guitar Dad lent me while we were playing!

CONTENT: か... 顔 上げて!　お父さん 全然 怒ってないから ねっ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: P-Please, get up! I'm really not mad! Please?

CONTENT: ペグが壊れただけだろ? そんな心配しなくていいよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Solo se salió una clavija. No te preocupes.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's just a broken peg, right? It's really not that big a deal.

CONTENT: でも...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But...

CONTENT: それに ライブ中に壊すなんて　なんか お父さん興奮しちゃうなー　え?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Y me emocioné al ver que la rompías en vivo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Plus, it was pretty rad the way you broke it in the middle of the concert!

CONTENT: 今は\"破壊専用ギター\" ってやつも売ってるらしいし
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ahora venden guitarras específicamente para romperlas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Nowadays, they sell guitars designed to break.

CONTENT: 今度のライブで してくれよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You should use one of those in your next gig!

CONTENT: 娘を どの方向に 持っていきたいんだ...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What kind of daughter are you trying to raise?

CONTENT: これも いい機会だし ひとりも自分のギター　買ってみたらどうだ? 遊んでー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Es una buena oportunidad para comprarte una propia.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Anyway, this is probably a good opportunity for you to buy your own guitar.

CONTENT: あっ それいいじゃない ねえ お父さーん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What a good idea!

CONTENT: 今回みたいにトラブったときに　すぐ対応できるしさ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Así la tendrás más a mano por si se repite algo así.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That way, if you hit an issue like this again, you can deal with it right away.

CONTENT: いや でも バイトはしてるけど　ライブのノルマで消えるから そんなお金は...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Estoy trabajando a medio tiempo, pero el dinero lo gasto en los conciertos y...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But... Even though I do have a job, all the money goes to my quotas. I can't afford...

CONTENT: 大丈夫! あ...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No worries!

CONTENT: お金ならある!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You've got money!

CONTENT: なな... 何? この大金 お父さん まさか闇営業...　は?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿De dónde sacaste esta fortuna? ¿Haces algo ilegal?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Wh-Where'd it all come from? Dad, are you involved in some shady dealings?!

CONTENT: ここ... こんな黒いお金 受け取れないよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I c-can't accept your dirty money!

CONTENT: うちは そんな切迫してないよ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We're not that badly off!

CONTENT: それはね ひとりの 動画広告収入で得たお金なのよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Es dinero de los anuncios de los videos que subes.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That's money you earned from advertisements on your videos.

CONTENT: 一定の再生数があると お金がもらえるんだよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pasado cierto número de visualizaciones, te pagan.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: See, if a video gets enough views, they pay you.

CONTENT: 動画サイトのアカウント　家族共有になってたの忘れてただろ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Ya olvidaste que subes tus videos a una cuenta familiar?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Did you forget the video site account you use is a family account?

CONTENT: じゃあ 私の動画...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You mean, my videos...

CONTENT: もちろん知ってるよ ギターヒーローだろ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We know all about 'em! guitarhero, right?

CONTENT: 再生数 結構あったから　お父さん こっそり 広告付けておいたんだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Tenían bastantes visitas, así que los moneticé.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: They've been racking up the views, so I monetized 'em in secret.

CONTENT: うちの娘 うますぎ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: How'd my girl get so good?!

CONTENT: いつか こうやって 必要になるときが来るかもと思って
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Supuse que algún día necesitarías el dinero.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I figured you'd need the money eventually.

CONTENT: ひとりが練習 頑張って　演奏 どんどん うまくなってく過程が見れたのは　本当に うれしかったなあ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Me alegró verte mejorar después de tanto practicar.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And it's been amazing to see you work so hard and get better and better at the guitar.

CONTENT: ねっ? お母さん　ええ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Right, dear? Yes.

CONTENT: お母さん 音楽は よく分からないけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Yo no sé mucho de música,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I don't know much about music,

CONTENT: 上手だなって思ったよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: but I do think you're amazing at it!

CONTENT: お父さん お母さん...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Dad... Mom...

CONTENT: まあ それに比例して　虚言が達者に なってく過程は　父さん 悲しかったけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Aunque me duele que mejoraras a base de mentiras.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Of course, it's balanced out by my sadness at seeing you get better and better at lying...

CONTENT: ゲロゲロー!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Barf!
There's 300,000 yen here.

CONTENT: まさか こんな 棚ぼた展開が起こるなんて
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No me esperaba un golpe de suerte como este.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I never imagined getting such a windfall.

CONTENT: 10万前後のギターを買ったとして 残り20万...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Si compro una guitara de 100 000, me quedarán 200 000.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If I buy a guitar that costs 100k, I'll have 200k left...

CONTENT: この残りをノルマに当てれば　2年近くはバイトしなくても ライブできる!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Puedo usarlos para pagar los conciertos durante unos dos años.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And if I put that all to quota costs, I could play for almost two years without having to work a normal job!

CONTENT: よし! バイト辞めよう!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yes! I'm totally quitting!

CONTENT: 今日の ぼっちちゃん ずっとキラキラしてるんだけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Bocchi-chan's been unusually chipper today.

CONTENT: 目が合うたび おじぎしてくるんですよね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And she bows at me every time we make eye contact.

CONTENT: バイト辞めれると思ったら　謎のパワーが無限に湧いてくる!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¡Pensar que puedo dejar el trabajo me da fuerzas ilimitadas!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The thought of quitting my job fills me with a mysterious and overwhelming power!

CONTENT: 早速 店長さんに言いに行こう!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Time to talk to the manager now!

CONTENT: はあああーっ! 超スーパーぼっちちゃん?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ultra super Bocchi-chan?

CONTENT: あ? バイトがなんだって?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What's this about your job?

CONTENT: あっ えっと その...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I... W-Well... S-See...

CONTENT: これからも誠心誠意 心血注いで仕事 頑張ります...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'll continue to work my hardest and most earnestly at it.

CONTENT: なんで突然の決意表明?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What's with the sudden declaration of commitment?

CONTENT: バイト辞めるのは 切り出すのが一番大変なんだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No hay nada más difícil que decir que renuncias.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: There's nothing harder than declaring you're gonna quit a job.

CONTENT: バックレ...　いやいや 住所 押さえられてるし...　じゃなくて みんなに迷惑が
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Me desapareceré... Pero tiene mi dirección. Digo, les causaría problemas a todas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Maybe I should ghost them... But they do know where I liー Uh, I mean, I don't want to put them out...

CONTENT: ぼっちちゃーん 今日 楽器屋さん行くんでしょ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Hoy vas a una tienda de instrumentos, ¿no?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Bocchi-chan! You're going to the music shop today, right?

CONTENT: 何か店長さんに献上したら 辞めさせてもらえるかも
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Si le regalo algo, quizá me deje renunciar.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Maybe if I buy an instrument for the manager, she'll let me quit!

CONTENT: 今なら お金 たくさんあるし!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I've got lots of money now, after all! Bocchi-chan?

CONTENT: あっ あの...　店長さんの今 欲しいもの 聞いてきてもらえますか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Puedes preguntarle a la jefa si hay algo que quiera?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: H-Hey... Could you ask the manager if there's anything she wants?

CONTENT: って ぼっちちゃんが
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Bocchi-chan asked that.

CONTENT: お姉ちゃん 誕生日 近いし プレゼントかな?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pronto es tu cumpleaños. ¿Será por eso?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Since your birthday's coming up, maybe she's talking about a present?

CONTENT: 特にない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I don't want anything.

CONTENT: \"いらねえ\"だって　うがっ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She says no thanks!

CONTENT: 終わった...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm finished.

CONTENT: ぼっち 私は　Dingwallとル・フェの 新作ヘッドレス　それと Darkglassの アンプヘッドが欲しい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Yo quiero un Dingwall y unos headless de Le Fay. Y un amplificador de Darkglass.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Bocchi. I'd like a Dingwall and new Le Fay headless and a Darkglass amp head.

CONTENT: 皆さーん 楽器屋さん行きますよー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Vamos a la tienda de instrumentos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We're heading to the music shop, everyone!

CONTENT: レッツラゴー!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Let's la go!

CONTENT: いってらっしゃーい ぼっちちゃん 優しい...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Bocchi-chan's really nice.

CONTENT: でも 私はサプライズ派なんだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But I prefer my presents to be a surprise.

CONTENT: 楽器屋さんといったら やっぱ御茶ノ水だよねー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Para comprar instrumentos, lo mejor es Ochanomizu.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If you wanna buy an instrument, you gotta go to Ochanomizu!

CONTENT: ねえ ひとりちゃん　なんでこんなに 楽器屋さんあるんだろうね?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Por qué habrá tantas tiendas de instrumentos?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hey, Hitori-chan! Do you know why there are so many music shops here?

CONTENT: そ れ は!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Well, you see...

CONTENT: 明治時代に　日本で最も古い歴史を誇る プロオーケストラが結成されてから　都内で音楽活動が盛んになって
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Desde que se formó la orquesta más antigua de Japón en la era Meiji, la música prosperó
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The music business flourished here due to it playing host in the Meiji Period to Japan's oldest professional orchestra, leading to the formation

CONTENT: そのころ御茶ノ水で 今では老舗と呼ばれる下倉楽器　イシバシ楽器が出来て うんぬんかんぬん...　今日一日 シュバってきそう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: y fundaron Instrumentos Shimokura y Ishibashi en Ochanomizu... Hoy no se va a callar.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: of now-legacy stores in Ochanomizu like Shimokura Music, Ishibashi Music, and etc etc, blah blah, yada yada...

CONTENT: ここ入ろう! 品ぞろえいいし
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Let's go in here! It's got a great selection!

CONTENT: 入りたくないな...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'd really rather not.

CONTENT: 本当はネットで注文しちゃおう って思ってたけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Yo iba a pedirla online, pero...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I was gonna just buy one online, but...

CONTENT: 通販サイトもいいけど 実際に触ってみて選ぶのがいいよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Comprar en línea está bien, pero elegirlos tocándolos también.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ordering online is fine and all, but you really oughta handle a guitar before you buy it!

CONTENT: あっ はい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: R-Right...

CONTENT: 楽器屋って店員さん怖そうだし　もし話しかけられたりしたら...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Los vendedores me dan miedo. ¿Qué hago si me dicen algo?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Music store owners are scary, and if one were to start talking to me...

CONTENT: お前 このギター選ぶとか なかなかのセンスじゃん?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You like that guitar? You got good taste, dearie.

CONTENT: 洋楽とか聴く? ああ 聴かない? 殺すぞ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You like Western music? Wait, you don't?! Time to die!

CONTENT: イ... イヤホンつけて ノッてるふりしてれば　話しかけてこないはず
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Si me pongo audífonos, seguro que no me hablan.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If I put on headphones like I'm listening to music, maybe no one will talk to me!

CONTENT: て... 店長　すごいヘドバン少女が 来店してきました!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: M-Manager! A major headbanger has entered the store!

CONTENT: コアなメタルファンに違いない!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Must be a hardcore metal fan!

CONTENT: ハア ハア... お客様!　メタル志向のギターを お探しなら2階の...　あっ えっ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ma'am! The heavy metal guitars are on the second floor!

CONTENT: あっ このストラップ かわいい!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What a cute strap!

CONTENT: この色とか喜多ちゃんの ギターに似合うんじゃない?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Este color va bien con el de tu guitarra.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: This color would look great with your guitar, Kita-chan!

CONTENT: わあー ピックって こんなに種類あるんですね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No sabía que había tantos tipos de púas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Look at all the kinds of picks!

CONTENT: イヤリングに加工しちゃおうかな　いいんじゃない?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Maybe I'll turn some into earrings! What a great idea!

CONTENT: このあと ハンドメイドショップ行きません?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Can we stop by a hobby shop after this?

CONTENT: あっ あと さっき調べたら お客様ー!　近くに いい感じのカフェも...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Plus, I checked in advance and found out there's a nice café nearby!

CONTENT: 楽器 見ろや
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Look at the damn instruments.

CONTENT: すみません このベースって 試奏できたりしますか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Excuse me. Can I try out this bass?

CONTENT: 大丈夫ですよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Go ahead.

CONTENT: 先輩 また買うんですか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You're buying another, Senpai?

CONTENT: 別に　ちょっと気になるから 軽く弾きたいだけ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No. I just like how it looks, so I'd like to play it a bit.

CONTENT: あっ スラップしていいですか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ah, is slapping okay?

CONTENT: はい いいですよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yes, that's fine.

CONTENT: あっ! こいつ まさか! これなんですけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Like this. Is she going to do that?

CONTENT: おおー まあ すごい...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Amazing.

CONTENT: て... 適当に弾いた... だけだけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I didn't even go that hard.

CONTENT: すごい いいベース
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What a great bass!

CONTENT: 試奏で本気出してドヤるヤツだ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Es de las que presumen al probarlos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: When you go all-out but act smug about it!

CONTENT: 別にいいけどさ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No es que sea algo malo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Not that I mind.

CONTENT: 何? 郁代 ん?　そのギター気になるの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What is it, Ikuyo? You like that guitar?

CONTENT: えっ? あっ いや そういうわけでは...　ん?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No, it's not like that...

CONTENT: 私には リョウ先輩から お借りしてるギターがありますので
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ya tengo la guitarra que me prestaste tú.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I've still got the guitar you lent me, after all!

CONTENT: ギターは何本あっても困らない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You can never have too many guitars.

CONTENT: みんな楽しそうでいいなー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: They're all having so much fun.

CONTENT: これが漫画でよく見る ドラマー孤独問題か
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Esta es la soledad del baterista que sale en tantas series.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Is this the lonely drummer thing I see in manga all the time?

CONTENT: あっ あたしもギターとベース か... 買っちゃおうかなー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Puede que me compre una guitarra o un bajo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: M-Maybe I'll buy a guitar and a bass myself!

CONTENT: 普通に弾く用でだよ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Just to play, darn it!

CONTENT: そうか さみしかったのか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I see. Were you feeling lonely?

CONTENT: 今度はドラム専門店 行こうね!　アキバにあるから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Otro día vayamos a una tienda de baterías. En Akiba hay.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Let's hit up a drum shop next time! There's one in Akiba.

CONTENT: これ かっこいい...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: This one's cool...

CONTENT: YAMAHAさん いいですよねー　あひいー!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yamaha's pretty great, huh?

CONTENT: それ 特注仕様なんですよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That one's custom-made, too.

CONTENT: 手ごろな価格ですけど すごくいいギターですよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's a really great guitar, especially for the price!

CONTENT: あ... よかったら 試奏なされますか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Would you like to try it out?

CONTENT: あっ いや えっと...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Um... Um...

CONTENT: 初めてのギターなら　シールドとミニアンプも そろえたほうがいいですよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If it's your first guitar, you might want shielding and a mini amp!

CONTENT: あっ うっ...
買います...　ぼっちちゃん もう持ってるでしょ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'll take the lot. You already have that stuff, Bocchi-chan!

CONTENT: あっ 経験者の方でしたか! 失礼しました
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, you already play? I'm so sorry!

CONTENT: あっ いえいえ 大丈夫ですよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hey, that's okay.

CONTENT: この子のギターが 最近 壊れちゃって
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Her guitar broke recently,

CONTENT: 今日は代替機を探しに来たんです
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: y hoy venía a buscar una nueva.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: so she's looking for a replacement.

CONTENT: ね? ひとりちゃん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Right, Hitori-chan?

CONTENT: 今どき 学生さんでも　何本も持ってる方 いらっしゃいますからね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Lots of people have multiples nowadays. Even students!

CONTENT: そうなんですねー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, really?

CONTENT: このギター 気に入った? ひとりちゃん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You like this guitar, Hitori-chan?

CONTENT: うん うん...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Right. Right.

CONTENT: このギターにするそうです
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She'll take this guitar, please!

CONTENT: ね? ひとりちゃん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Right, Hitori-chan?

CONTENT: ありがとうございます!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Thank you so much!

CONTENT: ぼっち 腹話術の人形みたい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Bocchi parece el muñeco de un ventrílocuo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Bocchi's like a ventriloquist dummy.

CONTENT: 最近 成長したと思ったけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I thought she'd matured a lot lately,

CONTENT: こういうとこ まだまだだな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But I guess she still has some ways to go.

CONTENT: よかったー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm so glad.

CONTENT: このギター 私が検品して メンテナンスもしてたんです
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I've been doing checks and maintenance on this guitar myself.

CONTENT: すごく作りが良くて 私も お気に入りで
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's really well made. I like it a lot.

CONTENT: このギターも お客様に選ばれて うれしいと思いますよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm sure the guitar's happy that it's going with you, too.

CONTENT: お買い上げ ありがとうございました!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Thank you for coming!

CONTENT: ありがとうございました!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Th-Thank you for having me!

CONTENT: お客様? ギター忘れてますよ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: M-Ma'am?! You forgot your guitar!

CONTENT: どんだけ帰りたかったの
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: How desperate was she to get out of here?

CONTENT: はい　店長さん\"また お店に 遊びに来てください\"って
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Toma. La vendedora dijo que espera que volvamos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Here! The manager wants you to come by again some time.

CONTENT: あっ はい すみません
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: R-Right. Sorry...

CONTENT: いいギター見つかって よかったね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm really glad you found a good guitar!

CONTENT: あっ はい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: R-Right.

CONTENT: どうする? なんか食べて帰る?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What now? Wanna grab food first?

CONTENT: 今日は解散 えっ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We're done.

CONTENT: なんか用事?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Got something else to do?

CONTENT: ぼっち 早くギター弾きたいでしょ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Bocchi se muere por probar su guitarra.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Bocchi. You want to play your guitar as soon as possible, right?

CONTENT: もうー また2人だけ 通じ合う感じ出してる!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hey! Stop having a telepathic connection, you two!

CONTENT: まあまあ 落ち着いて
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hey, it's no big deal.

CONTENT: あっ そうだ! じゃあ 今からスタジオ借りて　ひとりちゃんのギター お披露目会します?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Y si alquilamos un estudio para que Hitori estrene su guitarra?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I know! Want to rent a studio and try out your new guitar?

CONTENT: いや それは ちょっと...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ah, I'd rather not...

CONTENT: まあ 明日 みんなで練習するしね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We'll all get to practice together tomorrow, anyway.

CONTENT: そんときのお楽しみにしよー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We'll save the fun for then!

CONTENT: は... はい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: R-Right.

CONTENT: 文化祭も終わったし
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The culture festival is behind us.

CONTENT: 次のライブのこととか いろいろ考えないとねー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Habrá que pensar en el próximo concierto.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We'd better start thinking about our next concert, right?

CONTENT: ですね!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That's right!

CONTENT: リョウも新曲よろしく!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Write us lots of new songs, Ryo!

CONTENT: こればっかりは インスピレーション待ち
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Just waiting for inspiration to strike.

CONTENT: 私に できることあったら なんでも言ってくださいね　なんでも?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Si puedo ayudar, pídeme lo que sea. -¿Lo que sea?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Let me know if there's anything I can do! Anything?

CONTENT: 喜多ちゃーん　リョウに気安く そういうこと言っちゃダメだよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Kita, es mejor que no le digas algo así a Ryo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Kita-chan! Don't say that to Ryo unless you're ready to follow through!

CONTENT: フフッ じゃあ 早速だけど　牛丼おごって
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You can start by treating me to gyudon.

CONTENT: お姉ちゃーん!　早くしないと遅刻するよー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Si no te das prisa llegarás tarde, Hitori.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Sis! Hurry up or you'll be late!

CONTENT: ウッ ウヘヘ か... かっこいい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: A-Awesome...

CONTENT: あっ ご... ごめんなさい! き... 君のことも忘れてないよ!
